introduction: Julie and her friends plan a surprise birthday party for Alex (Rebecca Ambrosino), complete with a Leopard Lady video-gram and male exotic dancers. But it goes awry when Alex senses her dislike of beefcake men and her repressed desire for things more feminine. Not yet ready to come out of the closet, and confused by her newly-discovered attraction, her subconscious struggles through a horrific nightmare and takes her on a bizarre and surreal journey of sexual awakening as she confronts the vengeful wrath of a supernatural thong. In the aftermath of the party, Alex wakes up to find her coffee table littered with Polaroids. As she looks through the pictures, piecing together last night's events, she realizes she really may find women more appealing.
